fixes: Fixed small HTML parsing bug for comment editing
Total number of votes on profile is now accurate. It no longer counts the automatic vote
Extension now works in different KA subdomains

new: Added user/program reporting. Programs and users you report will go into a Google Sheet monitored by KA Guardian Evan Lewis
You can now add duplicate badges to your showcase
fixes: You can now see your own program's flags

new: Added a dark theme for the editor
You can now change your location text easily, in profile settings
Added the ability to edit comments
You can now link to a specific comment from a user's discussion page
fixes: Fixed a notification bug which stopped the number of notifications from displaying properly
